name: A Rock Hard Family
description:
My first ever game jam/making a video game.

P.S. It's very short

Controls:    

Left and Right arrow key - to move       

Z - to jump  

X - to dash/attack        

Up arrow key - to get more rock

Credits:

LeavingPython33 - Made most of the game

Skebudupobuuyada - Made the music for the game

SnarlyRex6 - Giving some suggestion
